price: 14. Después, hicimos que los sucedieran en la tierra para ver cómo obraban.
arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَٰكُمۡ خَلَٰٓئِفَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ لِنَنظُرَ كَيۡفَ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: thumma jaʿalnākum khalāifa fī al-arḍi min baʿdihim linanẓura kayfa taʿmalūna
